Method Detail

createVN

public void createVN(SliceSpec.Slice.Builder slice)
create a "mininet convergence layer: a middleware between cadsys and mininet i.e. a python script to run inside VM with a given topology of virtual switches For example: h1 <-> s1 <-> s2 .. sN-1 | | | h2 h3 hN WARNING: by default, the reference controller only supports 16 switches, so this test WILL NOT WORK unless you have recompiled your controller to support 100 switches (or more.)

Parameters:
slice - (virtual network spec. object)
